headline: At the University of Florence, Hisses of Student Dissent
leadPara: FLORENCE, Italy, Dec. 26 -- Pia Gambino, known to her friends as La Pasionaria of the University of Florence's political-science school, was outraged. She had just listened to the dean of the faculty, Prof. Giovanni Sartori, tell her and 150 other discontented students to read "the thousands of volumes already written about representative democracy" before they pressed him to make radical changes in the way he runs their department.
abstract: Florence U pol-science school student militants discuss their demands for univ reform; hold key to reform is altering of power structure; cite immediate goals as greater participation in school affairs and modernization of curriculum; illus
